data.title: Ben Chapman posted on LinkedIn
data.meta_description: Ben Chapman posted images on LinkedIn
data.text:
If you're 18-25 years old and interested in working in music, our Young Producers scheme is for you. From marketing, press, event management and programming, you'll work as a team to create an event in our Elgar Room from the ground up. Alumni Chase Ty and Kye Perry fill us in on what they learnt from the scheme and how it's helped their careers. Submit your application by 5pm on Mon 2 Sep: https://bit.ly/4cosICI

If you're coming to Edinburgh TV Festival - Supported by Screen Scotland next week and are intrigued by the impact of AI on the entertainment industry, I would recommend this headline Frontiers session i'm producing with will.i.am on Wednesday. The research calls with him have been nothing short of mind-expanding and Dr Alex Connock one of the UK authorities on AI will be helming the interview.

Oh dear. You've just asked a Royal Marine when they joined the Army. And you've tried saluting everyone you see in uniform. Working with the armed forces can be fascinating and inspiring. But - it can also be completely baffling! If you don't know your JNCO from your JIAG then don't panic. We've written a survival guide for civvies who have just started working in defence. üëâ https://lnkd.in/e_qrqVXt If you've been in this situation share your tips in the comments...
